name: DUNJUNGUY
description:
An adventuring guild hall was built in the country side, atop the mouth of an ancient portcullis. Beyond the steel and stone gate lies the twisting expanse of the DUNJUN, filled with vile monsters and deadly traps. Aspirants travel from lands near and far to delve into the DUNJUN’s timeless depths, seeking treasure, knowledge, and fame alike. Time has forgotten the DUNJUN’s origins, but many a rumor escapes the lips of bards, scholars, and soldiers.

In DUNJUNGUY, a party of up to four friends can test their might against the hordes of creatures in the DUNJUN. Combining Action RPG mainstays with mechanics familiar to Roguelike fans, players can choose abilities, find powerful gear, and navigate procedurally generated environments while staving off impending doom. DUNJUNGUY delivers a cartoony visual style, contrasted by its exploration of macabre and moody touchstones.

  • Title: DUNJUNGUY
  • Created by Aga Pito Studios
  • Open Alpha, available now for free
  • Platforms: PC (MacOS be strugglin)
